# Core Rule 4 ## Do not use alternative accounts.
- Players are limited to [color=yellow][bold]one account per person[/bold][/color], regardless of intent. - [color=red]Using multiple accounts to bypass bans, gain advantages, or for any other reason is not allowed.[/color]
